tweet: Follow me to be sung/tweeted the 12 days of Christmas live over the 12 days of Christmas :-)
On the first day of Christmas my true love sent to me: A partridge in a pear tree
On the second day of Christmas my true love sent to me: Two turtle doves and a partridge in a pear tree
On the third day of Christmas my true love sent to me: Three French hens, two turtle doves and a partridge in a pear tree
On the fourth day of Christmas my true love sent to me: Four calling birds, three French hens, two turtle doves & a partridge in a pear tree
